summary: Cologne Cathedral, or KÃ¶lner Dom, is a massive and beautiful church in Germany. It's the largest cathedral in the country and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Its construction started in the 1200s but took many years to finish, finally being completed in 1880. The cathedral is famous for its two huge spires, making it one of the tallest churches globally. Inside, it holds important religious artifacts. Every year, millions of people visit to admire its Gothic architecture and significance to Christian history.
title: Cologne Cathedral
